name: FlipACoin
0:
”Alexa, open flip a coin”
”Alexa, ask flip a coin who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flip a coin
des: Okay so your friend is constantly beating you at ping pong, and winners always go first, right? Wrong! With "Flip A Coin," you can have kitty flip a coin for you. To give that friend's winning streak a break and try chancing it follow these simple instructions; Go go to and (or) open your amazon Alexa enabled device and say, "Alexa, flip a coin." Kitty (Alexa) will then pick a random of "heads or tails," if you have this skill enabled. Just be sure to decide who's tails and who's heads before asking her to flip a coin. Have fun!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
